description: A classic cocktail as simple as they come. For this one just add all the ingredients to a mixing glass and stir down with ice. Garnish with a twist of orange peel
recipe: 60ml of Bourbon ,,3-4 dashes of bitters ,,10-15ml of sugarsyrup

description: A classic cocktail considered the height of class. For this one just add all the ingredients to a mixing glass and stir down with ice or shake if you prefer more dilute. Garnish with a twist of lemon rind or some olives.
recipe: 60ml of Vodka ,,10-15ml of Vermouth (~5ml for dry, 10ml but pour it out again for extra dry) ,,Optional: 10-20ml olive brine for a dirty martini

description: A lesser known cocktail and a variant on the Negroni. For this one add all the ingredients to a mixing glass and stir down with ice. Garnish with a twist of orange peel.
recipe: 20ml of Campari ,,20ml of Vermouth ,,20ml Rye Whiskey

description: A taste of mexico, the go to cocktail for a great night. Add all the ingredients and shake over ice. Serve in a glass with a salt rim.
recipe: 45ml of Tequila ,,15ml of Cointreau ,,30ml Lime juice ,,Optional: 10-15ml Sugar syrup if you like things sweeter

description: Simple 1800s cocktail, add ingredients to a glass and stir. Serve neat and garnish with an orangepeel or maraschino cherry
recipe: 50ml of Rye Whiskey ,,10ml of Sweet Red Vermouth,,2-3 dashes of bitters
